moduleMetadataJson.name: UNIX Gather RSYNC Credentials
moduleMetadataJson.description: Post Module to obtain credentials saved for RSYNC in various locations
author: Jon Hart <jon_hart@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USER_CONFIG
options.description: Attempt to get passwords from this RSYNC configuration file relative to each local user's home directory.  Leave unset to disable.
